scripts.setup-check: node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/setup-check.ts || node -r ts-node/register scripts/setup-check.ts || echo 'Install ts-node: npm install -D ts-node'
scripts.setup-check:fix: node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/setup-check.ts --fix || node -r ts-node/register scripts/setup-check.ts --fix || echo 'Install ts-node: npm install -D ts-node'
scripts.setup-workspace: tsx scripts/setup-workspace-remote.ts || node --loader ts-node/esm scripts/setup-workspace-remote.ts || echo 'Install tsx: npm install -D tsx'
